languages.text: {n}Конечно, на окраинах городов регулярно случались эксцессы — дикие воины пустошей охочи до грабежа, и слухи о мелкий стычках между ними и улейными гильдиями время от времени будоражат народ.{/n}

{n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities embody a more untamed spirit— the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds occasionally capture the people's interest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Конечно, на окраинах городов регулярно случались эксцессы — дикие воины пустошей охочи до грабежа, и слухи о мелкий стычках между ними и улейными гильдиями время от времени будоражат народ.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Of course, outrage was regular on the outskirts of the cities — the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager for the looting, and the rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds shock the people occasionally.{/n}

{n}Of course, outrage was regular on the outskirts of the cities — the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager for the looting, and the rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds shock the people occasionally.{/n}

{n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities embody a more untamed spirit— the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds occasionally capture the people's interest.{/n}

{n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities embody a more untamed spirit— the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds occasionally capture the people's interest.{/n}

{n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities embody a more untamed spirit— the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds occasionally capture the people's interest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}然而，城郊区域的生活方式却更加桀骜不驯。那些生活在废土上的野蛮战士总是渴望袭击巢都。有传言说，他们时常会巢都公会之间发生小规模冲突，这样的冲突总会引起所有人的注意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities embody a more untamed spirit— the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds occasionally capture the people's interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}然而，城郊区域的生活方式却更加桀骜不驯。那些生活在废土上的野蛮战士总是渴望袭击巢都。有传言说，他们时常会巢都公会之间发生小规模冲突，这样的冲突总会引起所有人的注意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por supuesto, las afueras de las ciudades tienen un espíritu más indómito. Los guerreros salvajes de los páramos siempre quieren hacer incursiones, y los rumores de pequeñas escaramuzas entre ellos y los gremios de la colmena captan de vez en cuando el interés de la gente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities embody a more untamed spirit— the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds occasionally capture the people's interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por supuesto, las afueras de las ciudades tienen un espíritu más indómito. Los guerreros salvajes de los páramos siempre quieren hacer incursiones, y los rumores de pequeñas escaramuzas entre ellos y los gremios de la colmena captan de vez en cuando el interés de la gente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}もちろん、都市の郊外には、より野蛮な精神が体現されている...ウエストランドのワイルドな戦士たちは常に奇襲に明け暮れる。そいつらのハイヴギルドとの間の些細な小競り合いの噂は、人民の関心を引くことも時折ある。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities embody a more untamed spirit— the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds occasionally capture the people's interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}もちろん、都市の郊外には、より野蛮な精神が体現されている...ウエストランドのワイルドな戦士たちは常に奇襲に明け暮れる。そいつらのハイヴギルドとの間の些細な小競り合いの噂は、人民の関心を引くことも時折ある。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Certes, les abords des villes symbolisent un esprit rebelle... Les guerriers des terres désolées sont toujours prêts à attaquer, et les rumeurs d'escarmouches avec les guildes de la ruche captent parfois l'intérêt des gens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities embody a more untamed spirit— the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds occasionally capture the people's interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Certes, les abords des villes symbolisent un esprit rebelle... Les guerriers des terres désolées sont toujours prêts à attaquer, et les rumeurs d'escarmouches avec les guildes de la ruche captent parfois l'intérêt des gens.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Natürlich verkörpern die Randgebiete der Städte einen ungezähmteren Geist — die wilden Krieger des Ödlands sind immer heiß auf einen Überfall, und Gerüchte von kleinen Scharmützeln zwischen ihnen und den Gilden der Makropolen bieten dem Pöbel hin und wieder ein wenig Unterhaltung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Of course, the outskirts of the cities embody a more untamed spirit— the wild warriors of the wastelands are always eager to raid, and rumours of petty skirmishes between them and the hive guilds occasionally capture the people's interest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Natürlich verkörpern die Randgebiete der Städte einen ungezähmteren Geist — die wilden Krieger des Ödlands sind immer heiß auf einen Überfall, und Gerüchte von kleinen Scharmützeln zwischen ihnen und den Gilden der Makropolen bieten dem Pöbel hin und wieder ein wenig Unterhaltung.{/n}
